item.title: Fail on me lol
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:1, topic:421402”]Im trying to make it where a mod can use this command but its not working, this is the command.

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("alert") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
			String msg = playerCommand.substring(6);
			for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
					 Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
					c2.sendMessage("Alert##Notification##" + msg + "##By: " + c.playerName);

It works on my acc but im the owner soo what do i do?[/quote]

Add it above ::jail command shud work. Easy as that.

item.title: Fail on me lol
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Im trying to make it where a mod can use this command but its not working, this is the command.

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("alert") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
			String msg = playerCommand.substring(6);
			for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
					 Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
					c2.sendMessage("Alert##Notification##" + msg + "##By: " + c.playerName);

It works on my acc but im the owner soo what do i do?
